docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Diagrams blockdiag { blockdiag -> generates -> "block-diagrams"; blockdiag -> is -> "very easy!"; blockdiag [color = "greenyellow"]; "block-diagrams" [color = "pink"]; "very easy!" [color = "orange"]; }
